title: Kim Kardashian shares cute video of Psalm hailing him as Saint's twin
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Psalm West was the centre of attention after Kim Kardashian shared a rare video of her fourth child.

The four-month-old, who was born via a surrogate, is hailed as a cute twin of older brother Saint.

The 38-year-old Keeping Up With The Kardashians star showed off her son, who was dressed all in black while lying in a crib laden with white sheets and blankets.

The reality star is not seen in the video but is heard speaking to Psalm, who looks engaged and moving his mouth as if he wanted to chat with his mother.

The KKW Beauty mogul is heard cooing over the baby, saying: "Hi cutie, look at my baby!"

She then laughs as Psalm looks like he wants to reply. Kim then says: "Hi cutie, hi Psalm, you want to talk so badly!"

Psalm, who was born on May 9, is then seen moving his arms around as he reaches out for his mother.

This comes just days after Kim shared a rare snap of her kissing husband Kanye West , on Instagram .

Just as her 149 million followers started commenting about the intimate pic, Kim deleted the post, much to many people's surprise.

(Image: Kim Kardashian/ Instagram)

(Image: Kim Kardashian/ Instagram)

The black and white photo shows the couple embracing and kissing on a rock in the desert.

They are both dressed casually in tracksuits with make up free Kim's hair scraped back into a bun.

It's not clear why Kim had sudden change of heart about the photo - but she may well have been the target of his angry fans demanding to know why his long anticipated next album had been delayed just hours before it was due for release.

(Image: Kim Kardashian/ Instagram)

Kanye shocked fans when he quit pop music and decided to make gospel music instead.

His album was supposed to be released on Friday 27 September, a date announced by the controversial rapper himself.

description: The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star has posted a rare video of her fourth child, Psalm West, as she coos over him
